alert.note: Alert for Grenada (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 7:39PM CDT until April 14 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR CHOCTAW...EASTERN CARROLL...EASTERN GRENADA...WEBSTER AND MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 739 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sabougla to near Lodi to near Emory, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Lodi and Sweatman around 745 PM CDT. Embry around 800 PM CDT. Bellefontaine around 805 PM CDT. Eupora around 810 PM CDT. Poplar Creek around 820 PM CDT. Clarkson and Sherwood around 825 PM CDT. Mathiston and Cumberland around 830 PM CDT. Chester around 855 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include French Camp, Mantee and Walthall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central, north central, northeastern and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
